snippet.title: Food Truck Simulator Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
Food Truck Simulator DEMO is coming on February 21st for the occasion of the Steam Next Fest.

You will be able to play a small part of the full game and taste features and mechanics that will be available upon the full release.

Driving, cooking, customising and serving will be all present features with more to come!
Please note that once you will get your hands on the DEMO, there are still few things that are WIP and that we are working.

You will be able to play on Steam 👉  https://bit.ly/FTSSteam and make sure to add the game to your wishlist!

Follow our development progress on our social media 👇 
Discord: https://discord.gg/mcXjfHrtgT
Twitter: https://bit.ly/FTSTWT
Reddit: https://bit.ly/FTSRD
Facebook: https://bit.ly/FTSFCB

Have fun and let us know what you think!
